entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
